The output textfile was generated by <a href="https://github.com/JaysonSunshine/Portfolio/blob/master/Software_Engineering/Python/Words.py"> Words.py </a> <a href="http://norvig.com/big.txt"> big.txt </a> | sort -f | uniq -i -c | sort -g -r. 

```{r, echo=FALSE}
suppressMessages(library(dplyr))
output <- read.table("output", quote="", comment.char = "")

inputPanel(
  selectInput("n_words", label = "Number of words:",
             choices = c(2, 4, 6, 10, 20), selected = 10),
  sliderInput("length_adjust", label = "Length of word:",
              min = 1, max = 25, value = 1, step = 1)
)

renderPlot({ barplot(head(filter(output, nchar(as.character(V2)) >= input$length_adjust), n = input$n_words)$V1, names.arg = head(filter(output, nchar(as.character(V2)) >= input$length_adjust), n = input$n_words)$V2, ylab = "Occurences", main = "Most common words in The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes")
})
```
